text:
Shares of Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        -1.06%
       rose 1.22% to $193.89 Monday, on what proved to be an all-around positive trading session for the stock market, with the NASDAQ Composite Index 
        COMP,
        -0.12%
       rising 0.32% to 15,360.29 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       rising 0.36% to 38,001.81. This was the stock's third consecutive day of gains. Apple Inc. closed $5.73 below its 52-week high ($199.62), which the company reached on December 14th. The stock outperformed some of its competitors Monday, as Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.17%
       fell 0.54% to $396.51, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +0.21%
       fell 0.18% to $147.71, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.04%
       fell 0.27% to $145.99. Trading volume (59.8 M) eclipsed its 50-day average volume of 53.2 M.
